item.title: Want to cry about the community?
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:422, topic:322467"][quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=418871.msg3285582#msg3285582 date=1280180881]

[quote author=`Aaron link=topic=418871.msg3285581#msg3285581 date=1280180793]

I hate it when noobs brag about there if statements and brackets.
fucking l2java nooblets

You aren’t any higher in programming ability.

So don’t go around bitching about shit you don’t even understand.
[/quote]I love how you assume, alas you never had any communication with me before this post you just trolled. I’m a lot higher in my ability to program then you and your father.

It’s funny because i wasn’t trolling you, i just don’t like you.

I don’t have a father either.
[/quote]Why do you right off the back not like me? And everyone has a biological father unless you were made in a test tube.

I don’t know my father (that’s why i said i didn’t have one, and of course i know that everyone has a biological father, unless my mom has been having sex with animals again.)[/quote]Okay, Let’s get passed all this bickering, That last comment made me rofl =P.

Read full topic

bitch.

item.title: Want to cry about the community?
item.dc:creator: @Errorist Errorist
item.description:
@Errorist wrote:

RS2 users find their way into the RSC Server Advertisement threads all the time. They don’t know their way around a forum. That’s not even counting the RS2 players who will enter RSC threads and whine about the graphics.

Newty said it perfectly, they are two different kinds of communities.

I don’t know what would provoke a RS2 user into posting in a thread titled “RSC”. If they don’t like the version, I don’t think they would enter the thread.

Okay, check out this thread now: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,445218.0.html

Read full topic
item.source: Want to cry about the community?

item.title: Want to cry about the community?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:414, topic:322467”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=418871.msg3266775#msg3266775 date=1278911739]

[quote author=Errorist link=topic=418871.msg3266520#msg3266520 date=1278894331]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=418871.msg3266178#msg3266178 date=1278880476]

Why isn’t there an RSC General section?
[/quote]Because you can talk about any version of RS in the RS section. Nothing is stopping you from creating an RSC topic apart from a 317 revision or 508 revision, etc.
[/quote] Yeah, bad idea. No one wants to post on the same board as RS2 players.
[/quote]That’s the dumbest thing I’ve ever heard. Why? Give an example why and I might understand.

Well for one in the RS2 Community you are ‘old school’ if you’ve been around a year or two and all the members are basically little kids who act e-cool and hate every other member that posts. Whereas in the RSC community 90% of them have known eachother since the scene began and are ten times more of a tightly knit community then the RS2’ers. They are also, for the most part, in their late teens and early 20’s.

Sorry for the jumbled post…[/quote]I don’t know what would provoke a RS2 user into posting in a thread titled “RSC”. If they don’t like the version, I don’t think they would enter the thread. Plus, he’s the one that’s complaining about diversity and “hating” the RS2 usergroup. I’m not trying to sound like a dick lol, but honestly the whole maturity difference contradicts his complaint.

Read full topic
item.source: Want to cry about the community?

item.title: Want to cry about the community?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:409, topic:322467”][quote author=Errorist link=topic=418871.msg3266520#msg3266520 date=1278894331]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=418871.msg3266178#msg3266178 date=1278880476]

[quote author=Errorist link=topic=418871.msg3265520#msg3265520 date=1278835471]
Why isn’t there an RSC General section?
[/quote]Because you can talk about any version of RS in the RS section. Nothing is stopping you from creating an RSC topic apart from a 317 revision or 508 revision, etc.
[/quote] Yeah, bad idea. No one wants to post on the same board as RS2 players.
[/quote]That’s the dumbest thing I’ve ever heard. Why? Give an example why and I might understand.[/quote]

Well for one in the RS2 Community you are ‘old school’ if you’ve been around a year or two and all the members are basically little kids who act e-cool and hate every other member that posts. Whereas in the RSC community 90% of them have known eachother since the scene began and are ten times more of a tightly knit community then the RS2’ers. They are also, for the most part, in their late teens and early 20’s.

Sorry for the jumbled post…

Read full topic

item.title: Want to cry about the community?
item.dc:creator: @Errorist Errorist
item.description:
@Errorist wrote:

Two different boards because the remaining RSC community on here have known each other for years and hate everything RS2 related.

That means any RS2 child posting on an RSC topics would get immediately flamed.

I’m trying to save people from being banned.

Read full topic
item.source: Want to cry about the community?

item.title: Want to cry about the community?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:410, topic:322467”][quote author=Errorist link=topic=418871.msg3266520#msg3266520 date=1278894331]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=418871.msg3266178#msg3266178 date=1278880476]

Why isn’t there an RSC General section?
[/quote]Because you can talk about any version of RS in the RS section. Nothing is stopping you from creating an RSC topic apart from a 317 revision or 508 revision, etc.
[/quote] Yeah, bad idea. No one wants to post on the same board as RS2 players.

If you make an RSC thread, RS2 people are likely to keep out of it.[/quote]

That’s because those RS2 players fail, sure make some threads you might be able to teach some of us something new about RSC.

item.description:

[quote=“Si Force, post:400, topic:322467”][quote author=Rixxx link=topic=418871.msg3237527#msg3237527 date=1276604797]

I don’t see what is so hard about just ignoring it, for something that apparently means nothing you seem to spend a lot of time whinging about it.

dude a cm irc legend
[/quote]dude

Can someone tell me what the point of this thread is?

Complaints about the community, or if you want to cry about something. It’s to replace single threads about people crying with one whole thread, basically.[/quote]
Usually suggestions complement complaints, so isn’t this topic enough?
